attributes.action: Ban HGV's from using the fast lane on dual carriageways during rush hour traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have HGV's caused accidents on our dual carriageways by simply pulling into the fast lane with no prior warning and creeping past another HGV often taking miles to overtake, causing cues and frustrating other road users. I suggest banning HGV's from fast lanes during the hours of 07:00 to 10:00 and 16:00 to 18:00

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
